header.description: Report header metadata — reporting period boundaries and generation timestamp, all supplied as parameters.

rows.description: One row per unique (job_id, code, minute_utc) combination from app_job_errors_minute, filtered to the selected reporting period. Each row shows the error count and the last error message observed in that minute.

totals.description: No totals section defined in this report.

semantics: date_from and date_to are required filter parameters that constrain rows to minute_utc values within the selected window. generated_at is a pass-through parameter injected by the system at report generation time and is not used for filtering.
transformations: No reshape needed — app_job_errors_minute already has one row per job/code/minute granularity.
Filter rows where minute_utc is between date_from and date_to (inclusive).
Order output by minute_utc ascending, then job_id ascending, then code ascending.
